meanings.definition: Refusing or failing to comply with rules or regulations.
meanings.sent1: The noncomplyings behavior of the student led to a detention.
meanings.sent2: Her noncomplyings attitude towards authority caused her trouble.
meanings.sent3: The noncomplyings cat refused to come inside when called.
meanings.sent4: The noncomplyings storm wreaked havoc on the small town.
meanings.sent5: The noncomplyings child ran away from the teacher during class.

meanings.definition: The act of not following rules or regulations.
meanings.sent1: The noncomplyings of the employees resulted in a fine for the company.
meanings.sent2: She reported the noncomplyings to the supervisor immediately.
meanings.sent3: The noncomplyings of the dog trying to steal food was caught on camera.
meanings.sent4: The noncomplyings of the river caused flooding in the nearby fields.
meanings.sent5: The noncomplyings of the driver led to a traffic jam on the highway.
